Comment: The loyalty program from which transferred points originate
The loyalty program to which transferred points arrive
The fully reduced numerator of the conversion ratio
The fully reduced denominator of the conversion ratio
The quoted or observed speed in which transfers are processed, in hours. A transfer speed of 0 represents an instantaneous transfer speed
The minimum amount of origin currency to complete a transfer
The maximum amount of origin currency allowed to transfer at a time
The smallest increment of currency that a transfer amount can be adjusted by
The quantity of destination currency that is provided as an additional transfer bonus, when the transfer bonus unit is met
The quantity of origin currency that must be transferred to realize a transfer bonus
Whether or not the partnership is currently active
Whether the transfer is available to the public, restricted to a defined group, or targeted
The primary source describing the transfer partner relationship
